header.subtitle: Fullstack Developer · Functional Analyst · UX & Process Automation

about.title: About me
paragraphs: I am a fullstack developer focused on functional analysis and process optimization. My career began in administrative and quality roles, where I learned to work with ISO 9001 standards and approach each task through efficiency and continuous improvement.
That technical and methodological mindset led me into software development, where I combine logic, design and analysis to build clear and impactful solutions.
As a freelance developer, I have collaborated with SMEs implementing tools that integrate automation, databases and process improvement, delivering practical and measurable results.
I am motivated to join teams where I can contribute this holistic perspective, continue learning and help develop technological products that create real value.

education.title: Academic Background
education.subtitle: Relevant studies and certifications
education.continuous: Continuous training in web development, cloud and artificial intelligence

items.title: Landing Page
items.description: Landing page with structured sections and contact form, featuring a modern and intuitive interface. Built with React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.

items.title: AI Agent for E-commerce
items.description: Automated sales agent that manages inquiries and products using N8N, Telegram and Gemini. Backend built in JavaScript with Cloudflare database.

items.title: Perfume E-commerce
items.description: Online perfume store with dynamic catalog, cart and integrated payments. Developed with .NET, SQL and React, focused on performance and scalability.

items.title: Shopify Technical Challenge
items.description: Custom Shopify solution to manage dynamic variant features and automated coupon logic. Built using Liquid, JavaScript, and advanced Shopify configuration, improving user experience and conversion flow.

items.title: AI Sales Agent Challenge
items.description: Technical challenge for an automated AI sales agent with database integration and conversational logic. Built with Cloudflare Workers, D1 and JavaScript, focused on e-commerce automation.

items.title: University Technical Degree in Programming
items.description: Comprehensive education in programming, systems analysis and software development.

items.title: Internal ISO 9001 Auditor
items.description: Certification validating competencies in auditing quality management systems under ISO 9001 standards.

items.title: English B1
items.description: Certification validating B1 level English focused on technical and professional communication for developers.

items.title: Workflow Automation N8N
items.description: Certification in workflow automation with n8n focused on system integration and process optimization.
